mapper.insert: insert into supplier_sqm(id, title, description, commodity, status, valid_to, last_valid, supplier_id, user_id) values(#{id}, #{title}, #{description}, #{commodity}, #{status}, #{validTo}, #{lastValid}, #{supplier.uniqueName}, #{user.uniqueName});
mapper.select: select id as id, title as title, description as description, commodity as commodity, valid_to as validTo, last_valid as lastValid, supplier_id as supplierId, user_id as userId, status as status from supplier_sqm;

select id as id, title as title, description as description, commodity as commodity, valid_to as validTo, last_valid as lastValid, supplier_id as supplierId, user_id as userId, status as status from supplier_sqm where id = #{id};

select id as id, title as title, description as description, commodity as commodity, valid_to as validTo, last_valid as lastValid, supplier_id as supplierId, user_id as userId, status as status from supplier_sqm where title like concat("%",#{title},"%");
